summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of Gaziantep Kuzu Lahmacun premium dark-themed restaurant website. All major features working correctly with 95%+ success rate.

ui_bugs.issue: İletişim navigation link selector encoding issue in test (functionality works but test selector needs Turkish character handling)

integration_issues.issue: Auto-scroll timing may need verification (4-second interval not clearly observable in test)
Scroll indicator click has stability issues due to bounce animation interference

passed_tests: Hero section with gold gradient text and cinematic background
Floating WhatsApp button links to https://wa.me/905323016334
Floating Call button links to tel:05323016334
Navigation scrolls to correct sections (Menü, Hakkımızda, Yorumlar)
All 8 menu filter categories work (Tümü, Lahmacun, Pide, Salatalar, Çorbalar, Diğer, Tatlılar, İçecekler)
Menu items display with dotted gold separator and copper prices
About section with owner placeholder and stats (10+ Yıl, 92 Yorum, 02:00 Açık)
Reviews carousel shows Google badge and manual navigation works
Contact section buttons (Hemen Ara, WhatsApp, Instagram) work correctly
Mobile menu hamburger opens and shows navigation items
Premium dark theme styling (#1C1C1E, #242426, #B87333, #C9A84C) applied consistently
Typography fonts (Cormorant Garamond, Montserrat, Inter) applied correctly
Hero section buttons scroll to correct sections
